content:
I have a services end point at https://fhir.careevolution.com/WebClientTest.Adapter1.WebClient/cds-services - using HTTPS
(except that it seems that I just broke it...looking into it)
I added my contact info and the server URL to https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10NMbAA0I4HRDcIkh6LPwTa0bcklfQJlBPcPjkIB1bWY/edit#gid=1085336603
Has anyone implemented the opioid CDC recommendation 5 CDS Service?
Yes! The University of Utah & UpToDate both have CDS Services which implemented the CDC Opioid use case

Were there any presentations or discussions that have been documented that occurred at the connectathon that haven't been posted in the github issues? If there are any presentation slides or other information that are available, could someone provide a link? I would really appreciate it. Particularly if they pertain to alignment between CDS-Hooks and clinical reasoning. Thanks!

Here's the 5min Connectathon presentation we did. I'll have a Connectathon report sent out to the mailing list with more details later today (I intended to get that out while in Madrid but got sidetracked)

As for the CDS Hooks / Clinical Reasoning unification work, if you're following our Github issues you're up to speed. Here is a presentation we did for the CDS working group. We'll have a separate post on this too explaining things in more detail
